metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3082 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: XSLTResult in Apache Struts 2.x before 2.3.20.2, 2.3.24.x before 2.3.24.2, and 2.3.28.x before 2.3.28.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the stylesheet location parameter.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
